urban_lines.title: Urban Lines Map
urban_lines.map_note: Use the mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out, and drag the map to move around. You can also use the +, - buttons and the Home button to reset the view. On touch devices, zoom using pinch gestures, and move around by dragging with your finger.

timetable.title: Timetable
timetable.notFound: Timetable not found for the selected line.

notAvailable.title: Timetable Not Available
notAvailable.description: The timetable for this line is not available in our system yet. Please call the information line:
notAvailable.note: You can also check at bus stations or operator's sales points.

airport.title: Airport Transport
airport.descriptionTitle: Transfers to Banja Luka International Airport
airport.departureLocation: All departures are from the Old Bus Station (Vidovdanska street).
airport.moreInfo: For more information about departures, visit the carrier's website.

ui.error: Error loading data. Please try again.

urban_lines.title: Mapa gradskih linija
urban_lines.map_note: Koristite točkić miša za zumiranje, a prevlačenjem miša pomjerajte mapu. Takođe, možete koristiti dugmad +, - za zumiranje i dugme "Home" za povratak na početni prikaz. Na pametnim uređajima, zumiranje vršite razdvajanjem ili približavanjem prstiju, a pomjeranje dodirom i prevlačenjem prsta po ekranu.

timetable.title: Red vožnje
timetable.notFound: Red vožnje nije pronađen za izabranu liniju.

notAvailable.title: Red vožnje nije dostupan
notAvailable.description: Red vožnje za ovu liniju još nije dostupan u našem sistemu. Molimo pozovite informativnu liniju:
notAvailable.note: Možete se informisati i na autobusnim stanicama ili prodajnim mjestima prevoznika.

airport.title: Aerodromski prevoz
airport.descriptionTitle: Transferi do Međunarodnog aerodroma Banja Luka
airport.price: Cijena karte u jednom pravcu iznosi 10,00 KM
airport.departureLocation: Svi polasci su sa Stare autobuske stanice (Vidovdanska ulica).
airport.moreInfo: Za više informacija o polascima posjetite internet stranicu prevoznika.

ui.error: Greška pri učitavanju podataka. Molimo pokušajte ponovo.
